title: When you're low and your team comes to save you

replies.body: how many episodes does this anime have and whats the plot like

End of humanity. Vampire hunting the last humans for lifestock.
Surviving humans fight the vampires.
Genre is like action, superpower, a tad romance (maybe)

It's pretty interesting, I love the anime.
First season has 12, second season also 12 episodes. A total of 24. 
But season 2 is not the end of the anime, we're waiting for another season.
Seraph of the end / owari no Seraph
